title: Yandex.Money — wallet, payments, transfers, fines
description:
🎁
GET 50 BONUS POINTS TO YOUR WALLET
🎁
This promotion is for those who are installing the app for the first time:
✔ Download the app
✔ Log in to your account
✔ Make a payment of 200 ₽ or more
Bonus points will be credited instantly.
1 bonus point = 1 ruble.
There are restrictions. More details https://promo.money.yandex.ru/mobile-app
📲 Add money to your mobile phone or travel card balance and your accounts in games. ⏱ Pay for internet services and utilities.
✅Send transfers.
👍 Get instant 5% cashback in categories of the month.
🎉Manage your spendings and monitor analytics.
💎
YANDEX.MONEY GAMES WITH REWARDS
💎
A Space Odyssey: the new season of the Moneyland chat quest
Complete goals every day and get a chance to win up
to 3,000 bonus points.
In the new season:
✔help SINTIE become a robot;
✔complete new goals;
✔collect crystals to spend them in the final game and win prizes.
🎉
DISCOUNTS AND BONUSES
Something new is added to the game almost every day, like a cup of coffee for free today or a discount for airline tickets tomorrow. Save what you like and use it whenever you want. You'll save more off purchases on AliExpress and Ozon, in M.Video and other stores.
😍
VIRTUAL CARD FOR FREE
Ready for use within a few seconds: add it to Apple Pay for contactless payments at stores or link it to popular mobile apps (taxi or food delivery). Get cashback in bonus points for mobile and online payments.
💵
RUBLES + 10 MORE CURRENCIES
💶
Open a currency account in US dollars, euros, tenge, Belarusian rubles and other currencies after identification. Buy and sell foreign currency at great rates almost as on the exchange market. You can also separately activate the "Multicurrency cards" package to be able to pay in currency at stores and withdraw money in currency at ATMs.
💳
LOYALTY CARDS
Add discount cards of your favorite stores to the app and use it for payments in those stores. Lenta, O'KEY, Ikea Family, Ostin, Sportmaster, Pyaterochka, Metro, and many more.
📲
PAY FOR MOBILE PHONE SERVICES
Pay for mobile phone services instantly without commission. It works with MTS, Beeline, Megafon, Tele2, Yota, Sberbank Mobile, Tinkoff Mobile, and other mobile carriers.
💻
PAY FOR HOME INTERNET SERVICES
Pay for home internet services instantly. Add money to your account with Dom.ru, Rostelecom, MGTS, Ufanet, Akado, TTK, Onlime, and other internet providers.
👍
Other payments:
✔ Utilities (including via QR code from the bill),
✔ Steam, World of Tanks, and other games,
✔ balance in Vkontakte and Odnoklassniki,
✔ loan payouts in any Russian bank
💸
MONEY TRANSFERS:
✔between Yandex.Money wallets (no commission),
✔card-to-card transfers between Russian banks,
✔between cards and wallets.
MANAGE YOUR WALLET AND CARDS
😎
In the app, you can:
✔monitor your spendings so that you could always know where your money is going.
✔check and top up your wallet balance from your card (without commission),
✔find the closest ATMs for withdrawing money,
✔configure payments and autopayments,
✔view transaction history of your wallet and cards.
Banking License
No. 3510-K dated 03/27/2015

This promotion is for those who are installing the app for the first time:

✅Send transfers.

🎉Manage your spendings and monitor analytics.


💎 YANDEX.MONEY GAMES WITH REWARDS 💎

A Space Odyssey: the new season of the Moneyland chat quest
Complete goals every day and get a chance to win up to 3,000 bonus points.

In the new season:

✔complete new goals;

🎉 DISCOUNTS AND BONUSES

Something new is added to the game almost every day, like a cup of coffee for free today or a discount for airline tickets tomorrow. Save what you like and use it whenever you want. You'll save more off purchases on AliExpress and Ozon, in M.Video and other stores.

😍 VIRTUAL CARD FOR FREE

💵 RUBLES + 10 MORE CURRENCIES 💶

Open a currency account in US dollars, euros, tenge, Belarusian rubles and other currencies after identification. Buy and sell foreign currency at great rates almost as on the exchange market. You can also separately activate the "Multicurrency cards" package to be able to pay in currency at stores and withdraw money in currency at ATMs.

💳 LOYALTY CARDS

Add discount cards of your favorite stores to the app and use it for payments in those stores. Lenta, O'KEY, Ikea Family, Ostin, Sportmaster, Pyaterochka, Metro, and many more.

📲 PAY FOR MOBILE PHONE SERVICES

Pay for mobile phone services instantly without commission. It works with MTS, Beeline, Megafon, Tele2, Yota, Sberbank Mobile, Tinkoff Mobile, and other mobile carriers.

💻 PAY FOR HOME INTERNET SERVICES

💸 MONEY TRANSFERS:

MANAGE YOUR WALLET AND CARDS

😎 In the app, you can:
✔monitor your spendings so that you could always know where your money is going.

✔view transaction history of your wallet and cards.
